title: Ep - 61 - Justin Bobby Brecia From The Hills
description:
Justin Brescia from The Hills discusses how the MTV show launched him into fame, what he thought about his co-star Lauren Conrad, and how he still keeps in touch with former girlfriend Audrina Patridge. Comedian Candy Lawrence reviews The Lowe Files on A&E. Writer and meme king Danny Pellegrino discusses the season premiere of Dancing With the Stars. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

www.loveandknuckles.com
